Trade/Device Name(s): SD GlucoMentor Blood Glucose Monitoring System
SD GlucoMentor multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System
SD GlucoMentor™ multi blood glucose monitoring system
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): SD GlucoMentor multi Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for SD GlucoMentor and SD GlucoMentor multi blood glucose monitoring systems using amperometric glucose oxidase technology for blood glucose measurement.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, palm, upper arm, or forearm, intended for self-testing at home or multiple-patient use in professional healthcare settings as an aid in monitoring diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
